Text: Hold position! We maintain discipline when others run!
Order restored. Secure the perimeter and count our losses.
Fall back to secondary positions! Maintain formation!
Look at all this beautiful scrap! My eyes are tearing up.
Jury-rigged doesn't mean junk! Fire everything!
One person's wreck is another's fortune, friend.
Contract parameters updated. Adjusting tactics accordingly.
Professional service means professional results.
Payment confirmed. Contract complete.
These readings are impossible... and beautiful.
Superior technology will prevail over primitive tactics!
Every sample brings us closer to understanding their true purpose.
The road endures, even when we don't.
Hauling cargo across the wastes since the cascade. What do you need?
You picked the wrong convoy to mess with!
The Harvesters left us a library. We're still learning to read.
EMP charged and ready. They won't see us coming.
Every artifact tells a story. This one speaks of war.
Civilians under our protection. Stand down or face consequences.
We stand together, or we fall apart.
There's enough salvage for everyone if we're smart about it.
Suppressing fire! Cover the advance!
Enemy spotted! Range 200 meters!
Medic! We need medical assistance here!
Reloading! Cover me!
Frag out! Take cover!
Target eliminated. Area secure.
Excellent work, soldier. Mission accomplished.
Strategic withdrawal! Regroup at rally point!
Fall back! We'll return with reinforcements!
Jackpot! This wreck's got enough parts for a whole loadout!
These components are still warm! Fresh from a fight!
One person's battlefield casualty is my payday!
Look at these beautiful scorch marks! Quality plasma damage!
Scrap 'em and bag 'em!
My gear may be jury-rigged, but it still kills!
You want my salvage? Come and take it!
Best prices in the wasteland! Everything must go!
Fresh from the battlefield! Still got the bullet holes!
Mission parameters received. Beginning operation.
Professional service, professional rates.
Credits transferred. Contract fulfilled.
Engaging hostiles with extreme prejudice.
Target acquired. Taking the shot.
Flanking maneuver initiated.
Nothing personal. Just business.
Fascinating energy readings! Record everything!
This alien tech defies our understanding of physics!
Breakthrough! These readings could change everything!
Superior firepower will carry the day!
Hybrid systems at maximum efficiency!
Field test proceeding as planned.
Data collection in progress. Maintain test parameters.
Convoy rolling! All units maintain formation!
Road's clear ahead! Full speed!
Fuel stops in thirty clicks! Keep those engines cool!
Best mobile merchants in the wasteland!
Got everything you need! Weapons, fuel, medical supplies!
Don't mess with the convoy!
Ram speed! Take them down!
Every artifact is a piece of the greater puzzle.
The Harvesters' secrets are slowly revealing themselves.
We must preserve this knowledge for future generations.
EMP field active. We are invisible to their sensors.
Phase cloak engaged. Moving like ghosts.
Knowledge is power! And power must be protected!
These ruins predate the Harvesters... fascinating.
Stand down! These civilians are under our protection!
Evacuate the non-combatants! Clear the area!
Let's talk this through. Nobody needs to die today.
There's a solution that works for everyone.
We rebuild together, or we fall apart.
For the community! For the future!
Medical team inbound! Hold position!
Commander Hayes here. Orders are orders - execute them.
Every battle is won before the first shot is fired.
Boss Merchant's the name, and salvage is my game!
In this business, yesterday's weapon is tomorrow's spare parts.
Dr. Chen reporting. These readings are... extraordinary.
Each artifact brings us closer to understanding their true nature.
Scholar Vex, keeper of forbidden knowledge.
Some secrets are buried for good reason.
Road Captain Stone. The convoy moves, or we all die.
The road teaches you everything - how to live, how to survive.
Broker Nash. I've got contracts for any crew with the skills.
No job too dangerous, as long as the payment clears.
